website_summaries.verdict: A well-priced paint that goes on smooth without the use of additional primer.
pros: Available in a wide range of colors and finishes
Goes on smooth and dries in roughly 1 hour
Low odor paint is easy to work with
2 coats provides full, high quality coverage
Sits at a reasonable price point
cons: Some found the “morning grey” shade to be more of a light blue color

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Did an amazing job coating the door in two coats! Seams very durable. Very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: APRIL HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: pigmented and quick drying
customer_reviews.text: Honestly blown away by the quality of this paint. I've never painted a wall before so this was purely based previous reviews and golly was this paint easy to work with! it went on smooth and buttery with no streaks from my roller at all. Almost instantly dried down too!
customer_reviews.author: SHAI

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite paint to use! It goes on so easy. I purchased a gallon to paint my china hutch and I still have plenty leftover for other projects.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Almost no odor
customer_reviews.text: The low VOC and mold protection were key factors for my purchase. I am chemically sensitive and this paint didn't cause me any issues/reactions. I chose white to keep the VOCs as low as possible. Paint is thick, goes on easy and cleans up well. I painted a cabinet in the kitchen and no lingering odor.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Whitemaine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color! Have already bought in another color. Great paint
customer_reviews.author: lib

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PAINT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a gallon of eggshell in First Frost. I'm covering white paint basically with white paint. So far two coats look like streaked crap. Horrible coverage. Paint was dripping off the brush as I was doing trim, with very little paint on the brush. I highly recommend you purchase a different brand. I have painted my entire interior with other brands, but due to Covid 19, I thought I would take a chance and order a paint online. I should have ordered from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage/Great Results/Happy homeowner.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent paint. Love the color.. was a little bit darker on the walls than expected from the example pictures shown... but with the white white contrast it looks excellent and I couldn’t be happier. Its a crisp clean modern looking color for a lovely 100+ year Dutch Colonial home. Showing off its charm of the old with a 21st Century color. Perfecto!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P.

customer_reviews.title: Best paint ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paint to paint my sons room. He had so many dings and so many small holes. I patched everything. I only had to put one coat of this amazing paint on the walls it covered everything and looks amazing! I am buying several more cans to paint a few other rooms in the house. You will not be disappointed with this paint. I purchased the color storm and its absolutely beautiful!.
customer_reviews.author: mom101

customer_reviews.title: Good Paint, Goes on Easy, Durable Finish After Curing
customer_reviews.text: This paint goes on easy with a roller, brush, or airless sprayer. I used it straight without thinning and it had excellent, even coverage. For up to 48 hours after the paint is dry to the touch it is still soft and can easily be scuffed or damaged if you're not careful. After 48 hours it cures becomes durable. Be careful during the curing time not to touch it too much and you'll be ok.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDweller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful blue quality paint
customer_reviews.text: Quality goes on thick, only need a few coats! Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: One coat coverage
customer_reviews.text: This paint is truly "one coat" coverage. I chose this based on the spruce makes newsletter and Kilz is a company I respect. The color is so close to its appearance on the Amazon site. It went on easily and covered the prior color (which was called baked potato). It certainly is a good value compared to higher end paint. Will be using this throughout the house!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Goodpaster

customer_reviews.title: When in doubt, buy more
customer_reviews.text: I used this to paint a small bedroom that was a sage green. It’s what I would consider a warm white and eggshell has a nice sheen in the sunlight. Definitely needed three coats in spots where I cut in with a brush so I was a little disappointed in the coverage. I painted roughly an 8 x 10 room. If in doubt, spring for the second gallon. I also liked the convenience of having the paint shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: Top Gear Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great paint, I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I used this paint for an upstairs hallway behind the mud room at my house. I didn't even have to use a primer before I used it. It covered up 15 years of every day use. I did use two coats. Easy clean up with warm water. It is a heavy paint and does not run easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne W. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Low odor, excellent paint.
customer_reviews.text: This paint is great. I wasn't sure how the phantom black would look, but it turned out great. It took two coats to get full coverage, but that's to be expected. It went on easy, dried quickly, and looks amazing. It's got almost no odor... In-fact, I'd go as far as to say that it even smells good. I'm impressed and will be buying other shades to do other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Swink

customer_reviews.title: Covers a lot of ground, but you may need several layers
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this paint in my bathroom. The color is slightly deeper than the color on the can. the application was quick and easy and it doesn't smell at all. However the way the paint is textured, it chips and scrapes off very easily. My fingernail chipped off a small piece as I was hanging a bath towel. Several layers of application may be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Keroberus

customer_reviews.title: Color not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Great paint but not really even close to the color it depicted in the amazon photos. Much more blue than green.
customer_reviews.author: christin

customer_reviews.title: "Limited Edition" colors is VERY WHITE, not gray - doesn't look like picture.
customer_reviews.text: Great paint, however, the color is nowhere near what is shown in the picture, it is very much WHITE with only the slightest possible tint of like a blueish-gray. Sad that this didn't suit my needs, as I now have a gallon to find something else for, or let sit under the workbench for years. Don't buy, if you're looking for GRAY.
customer_reviews.author: Third Star

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paint but color wasn’t for me
customer_reviews.text: I got lilac sand. The paint goes on nice and fully covers with two coats but I’m not in love with the color for the room I put it in. dries a little warmer than shown in the amazon photos it’s like a sort of warm purple gray
customer_reviews.author: SRD13

customer_reviews.title: Great paint
customer_reviews.text: The color is gorgeous looks different in every room depending on the lighting. Picks up the best colors against it. I am pleasantly surprised. I googled Benjamin Moore originally but this is what came up on Amazon I went for it ... thank God I bought 2 cans because I love it. It was hard at first to put on but I kept applying it and not giving up it’s worked very well and things I thought would streak didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Karmelalozina

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, amazing paint
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the flat black based on it being a KILZ product and I was not disappointed. Amazing to apply, both brush and roller, amazing self-leveling for a beautiful consistent finish, amazing coverage and single coat effectiveness. amazing low odor and cleanup brushes rinsed clear quickly. I used to be too frugal when it came to paint; now this is my go-to brand. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Frederick G. Ostrom

customer_reviews.title: nice  quality , no order and ....leak
customer_reviews.text: quality was good shipping was bad It leak out, but I use it because I want to paint next day.....
customer_reviews.author: Ma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome paint!
customer_reviews.text: Best paint I've ever used! Other paints used in the past where thinner & needed about 4 coats. This paint (granite gray) is thicker, only needed 2 coats if that (went from bright white to this color) Super easy to apply. Love the color too, using it for the walls in the kitchen (so no pics b/c cabinets & such are pulled out). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Color accuracy isn't perfect but it's still pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and covered in two coats! Online it appears to have a slight grey tinge to it that it does not have in person, so that is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bright color
customer_reviews.text: It took 15 long days to get here, although we are in quarentine, I get it. But it's still annoying. I open the box and the can seems very durable. the color is nice and bright. The color looks gorgeous on our walls. Much better than the yellow we had prior🤢😁 definitely worth the money if you ask me!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Spruce Best Home by Kilz is the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Redoing an entire condo with these paints! This line of paint is totally awesome! So Easy. Perfect results every time!! Very smooth and covers very well. You won't be disappointed with any from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Pattianncc

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage Profession appearance
customer_reviews.text: Painted several old shoddy pieces of furniture and brought a new fresh look to them. The super flat paint gave the appearance of some Amish furniture I''ve seen and I am very pleased with the fresh new look it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Esparza

customer_reviews.title: It Dries quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This color is so gorgeous 😍. I just finished painting my bathroom & still have a good amount of paint left. If you would like to see the full bathroom makeover go to my YouTube channel FluffyGirlNation. Subscribe to the good vibes.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Pleased even though I had to do 2 coats. However my bathroom walls were stained and the last job was 10 years ago. Color was what I expected. Paint was a good thickness. Bathroom looks so clean
customer_reviews.author: rosalyn s bishop

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I painted my kitchen with it and the color came out beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: One coat, perfect amount for a 14x14 room
customer_reviews.text: One coat over dark painted walls- very good! Navy color- perfect for my Library.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great Paint
customer_reviews.text: Great paint! SUPER coverage. Better than what we got at home depot. Looks lighter in the can and dries a nice soft light grey.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Couch

customer_reviews.title: No smell, gray was baby blue
customer_reviews.text: I liked that there was no smell, I ordered a light gray and it is baby blue. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Tubergan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: This paint was horrible. It goes on thin and drippy and takes at least three coats to go on regular white primer. I knew immediately it was really low quality. Amazon will not take any returns when it comes to paint. Don't buy it. A big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: PAULA S

customer_reviews.title: Spectral blue is just dark blue
customer_reviews.text: This pictures make this appear to be a deep gray/blue color, but it’s just a basic dark blue
customer_reviews.author: justme101

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Color was more navy blue than I had hoped from the color. Was hoping for more of a deep teal color. Goes on well; definitely a two cost paint!
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Ostrander

customer_reviews.title: Perfect paint
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast shipping, and exactly the color I was looking for. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Cockrum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shade and it was easy to spread! It had a low odor too which was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: It's not the color depicted in the photo
customer_reviews.text: This paint looks more white than gray. It's fine, but it's not the color depicted in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. One coat coverage even on my textured walls.
customer_reviews.author: shonda brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product, watch your color choices!
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to apply. We were painting and OSB product so it really soaked up the paint. We were happy with the paint but not prepared for the bright yellow (versus golden color) of the 'wax pepper' . We ended up repainting, same paint in a different color (gray). I would recommend this paint for its coverage and it was easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJereb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I painted furniture this past week with 2 different brands of paint. The KILZ was definitely better than the Prestige. It covered beautifully with only one coat!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Selby

customer_reviews.title: wonderful coverage
customer_reviews.text: My daughter painted my entrance hallway with this paint and the coverage is beautiful. We live in an apartment so the walls are not in the best of shape but this paint covered easily & beautifully. I was very pleased with my purchase and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 2 in 1
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this paint (calming gray) and was so unsure if I got enough/ if I picked the correct color/ if it would actually cover my hot pink walls. The answer to all my unsure ideas was YES! Absolutely amazing. Shipped faster than date indicated! Awesome, would purchase again in future.
customer_reviews.author: R R

customer_reviews.title: Great Paint Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve painted dozens of rooms and used Behr and Sherman Williams paint, and this in my opinion is the best paint that I’ve ever come cross. I was so impressed by the quality of this paint, and the price, I plan on buying more soon! I Definitely recommend this paint!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great paint
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would have done different is to combine the 2 cans of paint. Even though they were the same paint I felt like they weren’t identical.
customer_reviews.author: Houston is cool

customer_reviews.title: poor coverage
customer_reviews.text: It took a minimum of 3 coats to cover an off white color
customer_reviews.author: Diane C.

customer_reviews.title: color is great
customer_reviews.text: color is great easy to use but it chips easily from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great paint! Great deal ! 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this paint , not only doesn’t it have an order, it’s thick, easy to use, goes on smooth! I ordered the morning fog for my kitchen love it ! Best paint !!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not true to color- grey is blue
customer_reviews.text: I ordered " morning fog". The test area looked grey, but when the whole wall was painted it came out looking baby blue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 one gallon buckets of paint. I only recieved 2 one gallons . My reciept in box shows there’s 2 one gallons paid . But on my amazon Theres 3 one gallons paid .
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: great color
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and the convenience of ordering on line. It arrived in timely manner. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful paint color and coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great color! Just as pictured . Came carefully packaged and shipped!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great paint for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value, the paint smell wasn't overpowering, and I really like how the color turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jolley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: Love this color so much!! It's absolutely beautiful and creates a peaceful vibe in any room.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Quality Paint!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this paint, great coverage and looks amazing!! I just wish you could get it in 5 gallon buckets.
customer_reviews.author: Misty R.

product_meta.title: The Spruce Best Home by KILZ 15126501 Interior Semi-Gloss Paint & Primer in One, 1 Gallon, SPR-30 Gravity Gray
product_meta.description: Color:SPR-30 Gravity Gray| Size Name:1 Gallon| Style:Semi-glossThe Spruce Best Home by KILZ Interior Semi-Gloss Paint And Primer in One is a premium 100% acrylic, low odor, low VOC* product. Once dry, its stain resistant film is washable, easy to clean and long lasting. Easy to apply with a brush, roller or airless sprayer. Available in three sheens (Matte, Satin and Semi-Gloss) and 32 designer-approved colors. Our Semi-Gloss sheen provides a radiant, sleek appearance and is ideal for hallways, kitchens, bathrooms, trim and even interior furniture and cabinetry. The Spruce Best Home by KILZ Interior Semi-Gloss Paint And Primer provides excellent coverage and is great for touch-ups. Dry paint film is mildew-resistant. Cleans up easily with soap and water. Dries to the touch in 1 hour, recoat after 2 hours. Manufactured by makers of the KILZ Brand and backed by a Lifetime Limited (see product packaging for complete details and limitations). The Spruce: Make your best home. #the spruce best home paints Two coats are recommended for ultimate durability. Coverage is 250-400 sq. ft. per gallon depending on application method, surface texture/porosity and application method. Paint And Primer in One eliminates the use of a separate primer coat when painting over uncoated or porous substrates. A separate primer is recommended when stain blocking or where added adhesion is needed. Do not use on floors. Shake before opening and stir occasionally while painting. Read entire paint can before you start your project. (*VOC: 5 g/L, the addition of colorants may add VOCs)
feature_bullets: The Spruce Best Home by KILZ Interior Semi-Gloss Paint And Primer in One is a premium and long lasting 100% acrylic, low odor house paint. Once dry, finish is stain and mildew resistant.
Gravity Gray SPR-30 is a light silvery gray with a blue undertone.
Easy to apply with a brush, roller or airless sprayer. Dries to the touch in 1 hour, recoat after 2 hours. Covers 250-400 sq. ft. per gallon.
Available in three sheens (Matte, Satin and Semi-Gloss) and 32 designer-approved colors.
The Spruce Best Home by KILZ Interior Paint & Primer is backed by a Lifetime Limited (see product label for details and limitations).

specifications.Included Components: 1 Gallon Interior Paint & Primer in One
specifications.Warranty Description: Lifetime Limited Warranty, see product label for complete details and limitations
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars254 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
